title: Telephones: using and abusing
creator_credit: Jennie Blackwood, E Brereton and Post Office Film Unit
brief_description: A dramatised account promoting speedy and efficient use of the telephone. Guides us in the correct methods of dialling, answering and speaking on the telephone. With animation explains the complex sequence of operations within an automatic exchange when a call is made.
creator_credit_for_label: Jennie Blackwood, E Brereton and Post Office Film Unit
